Chronicals of Lunarsword: Chapter One

By Anonymous873 on Sunday, July 21, 2002 - 11:05 am:

Disclaimer: Uh...... Same as last time. With
that said, on with the story!


Chapter One
The Curse of Darkness

Lunar sped on, He knew that there was an
evil Elemental behind him and the Light
Elemental in front of him. If he could get to the
Elemental that lay before him he would be
able to take on the other Elementals, He was
so busy running and keeping his senses
tuned to the Light Elemental he stumbled right
through a tribe of Fire Wolves, One of the
many variations of Fire Elementals, these
creatures liked to hunt in packs of 20 or 30.
He never even noticed when a blast of fire just
barely missed him. He was that devoted to
tracking the Elemental ahead. All of a sudden
one jumped in front of him and he skid to a
halt. The creature spoke in growly version of
the animal language. “What do we have
hear?” He questioned. Lunar never even
paused, He unsheathed his claws and
rammed them in to the Fire Wolf’s snout! The
Wolf yelped and the others closed in on
Lunar. “That was your worst mistake cat! You
will pay for touching Flaming Alpha!” One said
menacingly. “Well who was he to get in my
way?” Lunar challenged. “He was the Alpha of
all Fire Wolves!” Another replied. Lunar then
knew what he had got himself in to. He had
just rammed four inches of claw up a Kings
nose! But he held up a brave front. “Well do
you know who I am?” He asked. “A lowly
normal cat!” The spokes-wolf replied. “Wrong!
I am the Ruler of the Water Cats!” He lied. The
Water Cats were a rare but formable species
and everybody knew it. “I don’t believe you. So
can you prove it?” The wolf questioned. Lunar
was up against a brick wall and he knew it. If
he were to survive this and beat the enemy
Elemental to the ally Elemental he would have
to hurry.

The Dark Elemental sensed something, His
target (Lunar) had stopped moving. He almost
rejoiced but that wouldn’t have been Darkish
now would it? He was currently in the shape
of a human warlock but decided to switch to
demon form for this. He started to morph and
became taller, then sprouted wings then
fangs and finally his eyes turned red, he was
a Demon. He continued on, about..... well, very
fast and within the hour came to the tribe.

Lunar looked at the Dark Elemental with fear
in his eyes. He had never before encountered
a Dark Elemental and had always hoped he
never would. The Wolves saw how he was
looking scared and thought it was because of
them. The spokes-wolf bragged “Why do you
looked so scared cat?” He questioned.
“Maybe it because you just realized what
we’ve known all along! That you can’t mess
with Fire Wolves!” He opened his mouth and
started chanting as his mouth filled with fire:
“Fire, burn bright! Fire, to my foes set light!
FIRE!” The fire started to descend towards
Lunar, but before it could get there the Wolf cut
it off with a gurgling sound. He was choking!
Lunar looked towards the Dark Elemental and
saw that its hand was pointing towards the
Wolf’s throat and making a motion as though
his hand was closing on the Wolf’s throat and
choking him. Lunar was frightened and
wanted to get out of there as quickly as
possible. He started to run but the Dark
Elemental noticed him and motioned with a
hand. A flash came out of it and hurtled
towards Lunar. Lunar saw it and tried to
dodge but was clipped on the side by the
flash. The Dark Elemental was disappointed,
had the flash hit him full on he would of died
but instead he got clipped, cursed. Lunar ran,
he ran as fast as he could. He only wished to
be away from that place where a massive
slaughter was taking place. He got to a cave
that night and decided to sleep there. It wasn’t
actually a cave but the curse made him see it
as one. He slept there for the night, right next
to a huge Bear of the Earth! A Bear of the Earth
is a rare and, luckily for Lunar, rather well
tempered and docile creature. When Lunar
woke up the curse was more active then ever.
Not only was he seeing things but his ability to
sense was giving off false alarms! Not that he
knew that, because he saw everything he
expected to see and nothing that he didn’t. He
ran and ran and ran, always trying to get away
from figments of his imagination. He saw the
rarest and most exotic of creatures, But he
was always pursued by bad dreams of the
Dark Elemental chasing him. He was
delirious and saw whatever he thought of,
whether he wanted to see it or not.
After 3 days it started to wear off. He started to
see tiny bits of reality through his vision. When
the curse had subsided enough he could see
completely. However his special sense still
gave off false alarms. He woke one morning
to find himself outside a cave, he had a
strange feeling that he should enter. He did
so and found himself standing before a griffin.
The griffin spoke: “ The chosen one is a cat?
Well cat, sorry, Lunarsword. You are obviously
the chosen one so I shall turn you in to a
magic creature, One that can help the capturer
of the crystals.” “Hold on!” said Lunar quickly.
“Who are you? And what’s this about
changing me in to something else? Only the
Light Elemental can do that and you’re not
the... Hey! Why can’t I say it?” The griffin spoke
“You cannot tell untruth near a griffin, there for
I must be the Light Elemental!” Lunar replied
quickly “Fine! You can change me in to a
different creature but only if I like it!’ The griffin
replies “Deal! How about an attractive human
in a pink blouse?” Lunar made a face. The
griffin proposed another “Fine. How about an
attractive human in a pink blouse with wings?”
He asked with a funny wink. Lunar pulled
faces “Fine.” The griffin said quickly “ How
about a cat with claws that are a foot long?”
Lunar looked at him, amazed at the craziness
of the idea, “How about I give one?” He asked.
The griffin agreed grudgingly “Okay, here’s an
idea. How ‘bout a flying cat, my size with a
gem on its forehead and an arsenal of
devastating spells?” The griffin agreed
“Sounds fair! You are not cured of the curse
that you were hit by but I have contained it for
you. If you still were affected by it it might
mess up the magic. Be careful for it can be
reactivated” A strange cloud lowered over
Lunar and when it rose a very strange cat
remained....


Feed back is very much appreciated!
